books.author: by Robyn Carr
books.description: In a moment of desperation, Devon McAllister takes her daughter and flees to Thunder Point, Ore., where she meets the man who could heal her wounded heart.
books.name: THE HERO

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by Louise Penny
books.description: Chief Inspector Armand Gamache of the Sûreté du Québec seeks a refuge in the tiny village of Three Pines.
books.name: HOW THE LIGHT GETS IN

books.author: by Robert Galbraith
books.description: The struggling detective Cormoran Strike investigates a supermodel’s suicide; by J.K. Rowling, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: THE CUCKOO'S CALLING

books.author: by Kathy Reichs
books.description: The investigation of a hit-and-run leads the forensic anthropologist Temperance Brennan into the world of human trafficking; the 16th novel in the series behind the show “Bones.”
books.name: BONES OF THE LOST

books.author: by Jayne Castle
books.description: The business mogul Drake Sebastian thinks Alice, a light-talent, is the key to finding two missing Old World crystals.
books.name: DECEPTION COVE

books.author: by Linda Lael Miller
books.description: The Hollywood actor Zane Sutton has returned to his rodeo roots in Parable, Mont. Is he home for good?
books.name: BIG SKY WEDDING

books.author: by James Patterson and David Ellis
books.description: When he begins to investigate a friend’s mysterious death, a man discovers she was leading a double life.
books.name: MISTRESS

books.author: by Diane Mott Davidson
books.description: Someone is stalking the caterer and sleuth Goldy Schulz.
books.name: THE WHOLE ENCHILADA

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: With New York City blacked out, a 16-year-old Jack Reacher helps a woman with a problem; a Jack Reacher novella.
books.name: HIGH HEAT

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: The symbologist Robert Langdon, on the run in Florence, must decipher a series of codes created by a Dante-loving scientist.
books.name: INFERNO

books.author: by Sandra Brown
books.description: An editor receives an  anonymous manuscript and sets out to discover its author's identity. Originally published in 2001.
books.name: ENVY

books.author: by Sandra Brown
books.description: Should a television reporter broadcast the secrets confided to her by the first lady? Originally published in 1996.
books.name: EXCLUSIVE

books.author: by A. S. A. Harrison
books.description: A chilling portrait of a marriage gone terribly awry is presented in alternating voices.
books.name: THE SILENT WIFE

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: An imprisoned ex-lawyer schemes to exchange information about who murdered a judge for his freedom.
books.name: THE RACKETEER
